classificationCodes.maingroupTitle: separation of liquids, not provided for elsewhere
classificationCodes.subclassTitle: separation separating solids from solids by wet methods by pneumatic jigs or tables by other dry methods b07; magnetic or electrostatic separation of solid materials from solid materials or fluids, separation by high-voltage electric fields centrifuges, vortex apparatus b04; presses per se for squeezing-out liquid from liquid-containing material treatment of water e.g. softening by ion-exchange arrangements of air intake cleaners in gas turbine plants arrangements or mounting of filters in air-conditioning, air-humidification or ventilation
